alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, western Geauga, northeastern Medina, Cuyahoga, southwestern Lake and Summit Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers along a line extending from Cleveland to near Barberton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Painesville, Ravenna, Chardon, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, North Royalton, Kent, Barberton, Solon, Willoughby, Hudson, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Streetsboro and Warrensville Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
